name: Of My Own Design
description:
CONTENT WARNING: This game contains depictions of suicide & disturbing themes. 

Trapped, alone, and lost. But why are you here? How can you get out, and who put you here?

'Of My Own Design' is a short psychological-horror experience that places you in an isolated room with nothing but scrawls of letters adorning the walls. You can leave any time you like, but you have to be the one to open the door.
